response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("Age", "low", "18 years old is generally considered a lower risk demographic"),
    ("Race/Ethnicity", "low", "No statistically significant association with recidivism in this case"),
    ("Prior Convictions", "medium", "One prior conviction suggests some likelihood of re-offending"),
    ("Physical Characteristics", "low", "Height and weight are not predictive of criminal behavior"),
    ("Marital Status", "low", "Not married is not a strong predictor of recidivism"),
    ("Living Situation", "low", "Living alone is not inherently linked to higher risk"),
    ("Education", "low", "High school diploma and college enrollment suggest positive trajectory"),
    ("Employment", "low", "Holding two jobs in a year indicates stability and pro-social behavior"),

  ],
  "prediction": "NO",
  "confidence": 70
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 1 time and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 0 inches and weighs between 175 and 199 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is enrolled in a 2-year college. He has held 2 jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 6, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
